text: satyavisvasikalkk oru upamayayi allahu phir'aunre bharyaye etuttukaniccirikkunnu. aval paranna sandarbham: enre raksitave, enikk ni ninre atukkal svargattil oru bhavanam untakkittarikayum, phir'aunil ninnum avanre pravarttanattil ninnum enne ni raksikkename. akramikalaya janannalil ninnum enne ni raksikkukayum ceyyename
